SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Angle

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Angle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Angle extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents an angle of a card. It contains the resource on the angle, the status of the angle and the reference to the linked angle.
See Also:

      public void setLinkedAngle(Angle linkedAngle, AngleStatus angleStatus) throws AngleAlreadyLinkedException
      Set the linked angle
      Parameters:
      linkedAngle - The reference to the angle linked with this angle
      angleStatus - Represent the status of the angle
      Throws:
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - Exception thrown when the angle is already occupied
